title: Does Pfizer warn of unprotected sex after the COVID-19 vaccine?
subtitle: Mimi's "copying" raised more concerns about the COVID-19 vaccine on social media.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Pfizer's "p. 132" vaccine warns against unprotected sex for 28 days after the second dose of COVID-19 because "genesis manipulation" may cause birth defects.
